Waltham.Newell D. Johnson House: The Newell D. Johnson House is a historic house at 428 Lexington Street in Waltham, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built in 1894, and is one of the most elaborate Queen Anne houses in the city's Piety Corner neighborhood. It has an octagonal tower at one corner with a pyramidal roof, bands of decorative cut wood shingling, and fluted porch posts.
